snippet: A year after winning the triple crown, Miguel Cabrera may be playing even better.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers defeat Chicago White Sox, 6-4; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: A year after winning the triple crown, Miguel Cabrera may be playing even better.

headline.main: Cabrera’s Homer Powers Tigers Over White Sox
